oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge record for James Alexander Ogg, Co. C, 2nd Tenn. Inf. Regt. USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cpl. James A. Ogg of Knoxville, Tennessee served in Co. C, 2nd Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA. Like many Union soldiers, Ogg was discharged at Nashville, Tenn. in the summer of 1865 with the cessation of hostilities between the North and the South. Ogg, formerly a farmer, is 35, and the discharge contains a physical description of him.
